description:
We are working with a top textile company that provides clothing, footwear and fashion accessories for women and men. They partner with companies around the globe to provide the highest performing all-weather technology. Incredible assortment of waterproof, windproof and all-weather technologies. Committed to innovation and service. Growing and adding to their team!
We are looking for a Senior Director or Vice President of Sales for North America and Europe. Seeking someone with 15+ years of experience in the textile industry. Outdoor sportswear background is preferable.
This Sales Executive will be leading a sales team as well as working on a few major accounts as well. Will support new customer acquisition by searching out new customers for the company’s portfolio that include outdoor, urban fashion, cycling, running, snowsports etc. Up to 30% travel domestically and internationally. Strong leadership and previous management experience is necessary. Must be willing to work on accounts as well. Strong understanding of textile manufacturing process especially in weaving/knitting and lamination processes.
REMOTE. If close the corporate office would work in-house. Excellent location
All Candidates must be able to provide work related references.
